tool_description: Checks bird species presence against seasonal patterns and migration timing for the observation location and date.

species_list.description: Species names to check seasonal presence

observation_date.description: Date of observation in ISO format

error_messages: Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 date-time format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss).
Empty species list: Provide at least one species name.
Invalid coordinates: Ensure latitude [-90,90] and longitude [-180,180].
Too many species: Limit to 30 species for processing.
usage: Input species_list, observation_date, and coordinates. Optionally set include_vagrants. Returns seasonal presence analysis for identification timing.

expected_species.description: Species expected at this time and location

seasonal_status.description: Seasonal status for each species (resident, migrant, vagrant)

peak_presence_dates.description: Optimal observation periods for each species
